name: Animal Arena Attack
description:
Animal Arena Attack is a Cooperative Boss Fighting game where two players, an agile Eagle and a cunning Salamander, must team up to take down the all powerful Chimera that stands before them. Using both ranged and melee attacks, the players must duck and dodge through a gauntlet of menacing abilities thrown at them by the Chimera. Watch out though, as the further you get in the fight, the stronger the Chimera will get. Do you have what it takes to make it out alive?

Programmers: Jason Deluga, Cole Kersting, Alex Cook, William Nomikos

Designers: Ryan Voss, Tavion Netters, Spencer McDaniel, Lachlan Duncan

Artists: Emily Plassenthal, Riley Egan, Olivia Miller,  Gwen Collins, Luke Short

Player 1: WASD, Q to Attack, E to dodge.

Player 2: Arrow Keys, Period to attack, Right Shift to dodge.

Play in Fullscreen for best results.
